doc:
Merlin Santana https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Merlin_Santana 0 Merlin Santana (March 14, 1976 – November 9, 2002) was an American actor. Santana was best known for his roles as Rudy Huxtable's boyfriend Stanley on The Cosby Show, Marcus Dixon on Getting By, Marcus Henry in Under One Roof and as high school student Romeo Santana on The WB sitcom The Steve Harvey Show. Merlin_Santana ( March_14_,_1976 – November_9_,_2002 ) was an_American_actor . Santana was_best_known for his_roles as Rudy_Huxtable 's_boyfriend_Stanley on The_Cosby_Show , Marcus_Dixon on Getting By , Marcus_Henry in Under_One_Roof and as_high_school_student_Romeo_Santana on The_WB_sitcom The_Steve_Harvey_Show .
